data.message: I am trying to remove a fake 1 star review off my page is there anything you can do to help fix this? I received a message and then he left a fake review shortly there after. Thank you.

replies.message: Hi Tim. If someone left a review that doesn't follow our Community Standards, or doesn't focus on your product or service, you can report it to us by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2iWzffe. Keep in mind you can also turn off reviews for your Page. -Kiara

Hi Kiara, it doesn't focus on our product or service but they didn't write anything all they did was give us a 1 star. So because they didn't write anything I am not able to report it. Am I missing something? Is there another way to report it? We would like to keep the reviews up so that new potential clients can see that we are a good credible business. We were at 5 stars until this. Thank you for your help.
I followed your guide how to appeal for disabled accounts. Do you not support disabled accounts? Facebook
